title: Tori Spelling poses in cat ears and whiskers as she joins her family for Halloween fun
text:
She gushed over her step-son Jack McDermott and wished him a happy 21st birthday on Monday.

And Tori Spelling ensured she didn't ignore her other five children later that night when she treated them to a Halloween pumpkin patch visit.

The 46-year-old beauty was seen at Mr Bones Pumpkin Patch in Culver City, California where she coordinated with her family and joined them in dressing up like a cat.

Family time: Tori Spelling dressed up like her kids on Monday evening when she attended the Mr. Bones Pumpkin Patch in Culver City with her five kids and husband Dean McDermott

Tori dressed in a white v-neck T-shirt underneath a pair of cropped overalls that were cinched in at the waist.

The 90210BH star completed her look with a pair of buckle boots and accessorized with bangles around her wrist.

Her blonde hair was crimped and styled out for the kid friendly event and her makeup simple underneath her whiskers.

Playing dress-up: The blonde, left, dressed in a white v-neck T-shirt underneath a pair of cropped overalls that were cinched in at the waist. On the right is Erin Ziering

Not in the holiday spirit: The Inn Love star was joined by her husband Dean who didn't appear to be dressed up

Mom & Dad love: The looker and Dean were seen giving their youngest, Beau, two, a kiss on his cheeks at one point

Tori's glam featured a dark outlined eye, false lashes and a bold dark lip.

And it wasn't just Tori wearing cat ears and drawn on whiskers, the entire family, besides husband Dean McDermott, all joined in.

The Scary Movie 2 star's appearance comes after she took to social media earlier in the day to wish her step-son, Jack, a happy 21st birthday.

In the lengthy post, she opened up about their on-and-off relationship in the 14 years they've known each other.

'I’ve known this guy since he was almost 7. I loved when we met bc he had no idea who I was. And, I don’t mean tori spelling,but the woman his dad was dating,' she began after warning him she was about to 'embarrass' him.

Bringing the drama: The 90210 BH star completed her look with a pair of buckle boots and accessorized with bangles around her wrist

Outing: The 46-year-old beauty was seen at Mr. Bones Pumpkin Patch in Culver City where she coordinated with her family and joined them in dressing up like a cat

Tori continued to express that it was a hard transition for him as he was going through his parent's divorce and they were also trying to work out the best way to navigate it all.

'When we met we bonded over dogs, his rabbit DIY school project, tag, hide and seek, and video games. He called me Teri. And I didn’t correct him bc I loved that he had his own perception of me.'

'This little boy grew. And, I remember helping him with his homework and reading Charlottes Web, dressing up his hamsters in DIY Halloween costumes, and playing Polly Pockets at the pool while other boys his age teased and we ignored them and laughed and played and had so much fun they eventually asked to join.'

'I remember his feet growing and eventually we could share the same shoes (not now he wears a 14 ha ha!). And, I then remember the years as I watched this young boy grow to be a pre teen and a teen and try to figure out his role in our blended family.'

Doting parents: Tori and Dean have six children between them but ensure they spend one-on-one time with their kids

She's a cat! Her glam featured a dark outlined eye, false lashes and a bold dark lip

But things weren't always swell for Tori and her relationship with Jack, penning they drifted apart in his teen years.

'Then came years of awkwardness. He was quiet. I was quiet. It was new to me and I never wanted to push my role in his life. I’ve loved him since he was that little boy that called me Teri and played Polly Pockets with me.'

And thankfully for the duo, things changed and they grew closer with Jack revealed his sexuality.

'And, then he came out. I was so proud of his confidence. He was who he was and he was proud of it. And, then we bonded again. We found each other on a new level with a whole new respect for each other.'

Step-son love: The Scary Movie 2 star's appearance comes after she took to social media earlier in the day to wish her step-son, Jack, a happy 21st birthday

The 90210 BH actress continued to gush over her eldest son, calling him 'smart', 'kind', 'funny' and an 'inspiration.'

Dean married actress Mary Jo Eustace in 1993 before welcoming their first and only child, Jack, in 1998.

After 13 years of marriage, Dean had an affair with Tori which led to their divorce.

Tori was also married to Charlie Shanian at the time.

Just one-month after Charlie filed and three-months after Mary Jo, the new couple wed in May 2006.

Tori and Dean renewed their vows on May 8, 2010, in Beverly Hills, California.

The pair are parents to five children; Liam Aaron, 12, Stella Doreen, 11, Hattie Margaret, seven, Finn Davey, seven, and Beau Dean, two.
description: Tori Spelling dressed up like her kids on Monday evening when she attended the Mr. Bones Pumpkin Patch in Culver City with her five kids and husband Dean McDermott.
